textBox.richText: I received, together with Norman Poh, Josef Kittler, Driss Matrouf and Jean-François Bonastre, 4 colleagues from the MOBIO project, the Best Scientific Paper Award for the paper entitled “Model and Score Adaptation for Biometric Systems: Coping with Device Interoperability and Changing Acquisition Conditions” at the International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR) on August 23-26 2010 in Istanbul (Turkey). Thanks to all of them and in particular to Norman.
Best Scientific Paper Award at ICPR 2010
